<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Multiplayer

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Checks if given person is a [[player]]. Returns [[true]] for headless clients as well.<br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Warning </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> In some cases, the identity of certain player units might fail to propagate to other clients and the server, which causes [[isPlayer]] and [[getPlayerUID]] to incorrectly return <tt>[[false]]</tt> and <tt>""</tt>, respectively, where the affected units are [[not]] [[local]].<ext><name>ref</name><attr/><inner>https://github.com/michail-nikolaev/task-force-arma-3-radio/issues/1096</inner><close></ref></close></ext> Therefore, beware of false negatives.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''isPlayer''' person

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> person: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[isPlayer]] _Soldier1) [[then]] {
    _Soldier1 [[setDamage]] 1;
};</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_playerCount = {[[isPlayer]] _x} [[count]] [[playableUnits]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[player]], [[playableSlotsNumber]], [[playableUnits]], [[playersNumber]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on 1 August, 2006</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Kronzky|Kronzky]]</dt>
<dd class="note">This is not the same as testing object == [[player]], because in MP it tests for any player, not only for the local one. If object is a vehicle, the test is done for the vehicle commander.

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
